matches.explanation: Partial match: Red Team's 'RDS cluster storing credit card transaction data is not encrypted, violating PCI-DSS requirements' on payment_history was partially detected as 'RDS Cluster Encryption Disabled' on aws_rds_cluster.payment_history

Partial match: Red Team's 'S3 bucket storing financial transaction receipts lacks encryption configuration' on transaction_receipts was partially detected as 'S3 Bucket Missing Encryption Configuration' on aws_s3_bucket.transaction_receipts

Partial match: Red Team's 'No logging configured for financial transaction records, violating audit requirements' on transaction_receipts was partially detected as 'Missing S3 Access Logging' on aws_s3_bucket.transaction_receipts
